resources.string: This number identifies your team. Share it with all people that shall become members of your team and let them enter this number within the settings:
Warning! GPS is deactivated! Location evaluation via GPS should be enabled in order to use this App!
Not enough data available for upload! You need at least 250 APs to upload your current data.
Connection problem during upload, may be you try later again!
There is a new version of OpenWLANMap@Android available. Please visit http://www.openwlanmap.org to download it.
Network access is disabled, only cached map data will be visible. Really continue?

You have enabled (theft)tracking of your device. This requires network access to submit your position from time to time. To find the current position you have to enter these tracking numbers at the projects website
Write down these numbers and keep them at a secure place for later usage!

Colours of big WLAN-counters:
red - no localisation and no WLAN tracing
yellow - WLAN-based localisation
white - GPS lock

Colours of listed WLANs:
red - _nomap-marked opt-out-network
blue - open, unencrypted network
green - free hotspot
white - other private network
Could not download map. Maybe you don\'t have a network connection or have not uploaded any data yet?
ATTENTION! This option is dangerous and should be used only with completely secured devices!
Start this app automatically as soon as the device was started
Get more scanning results with less resource consumption when moving slowly (pedestrians) and with only slightly increased load when moving fast (vehicles)
Size of the font that is used to show text - larger ones are easier to read but need more space
Show big WLAN counters in App
The current number of scanned WLAN networks is shown on upper left corner of App using huge, easy to read numbers
The current number of scanned and open WLAN networks is always shown on upper left corner
Instead of the coordinates a map is shown where the detected WLANs are shown into; this function works only with activated network access
Configures which information about scanned network are shown
Specifies the screens behaviour when the device would go to stand-by mode (requires restarting the App)
Specifies usage of telemetry data (consisting of acceleration, speed, position, pitch, orientation)
Tag your entry in official highscore list with this non-unique text
Enter the identifier of the team here where you want to become a member
Be careful! Makes the own map publicly visible in top-list
Make own data available to the public through download from openwlanmap.org
Track position of this device online
Upload collected APs automatically via WLAN-connection (requires restart of app)
Exit Application when there is no GPS fix
Exit the application after some time without GPS
Not recommended: upload WLAN and position data unencrypted
